JobFullDesc: About the Role:As an iOS engineer on the team, you will be responsible for creating delightful and sticky fares consumer experience. Whether this is ensuring our Fares are razor-fast, defect-free or well understood by riders/drivers, there is tremendous scope in building engaging user experiences around fare comprehension, clarity & acceptance. A compelling fares experience will be an important lever in ensuring marketplace health and stimulating both short and long term gross billings via long-term rider engagement.What You’ll Do:You will deliver high quality mobile softwares. You will write, release and maintain mobile codeYou will develop framework with you strong expertise in Objective C or SwiftYou use experimentation to measure the success of products or platformYou work with Android and backend engineers to improve the scalability and reliability of the end to end workflow.You provide guidance to mobile engineers on resolving reliability issues.You will help define the next generation of Fare Mobile SDKBasic Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experienceStrong experience in either Swift and/or Objective2+ years of professional experience building in either mobile platform/sdk/dev tools, or mobile consumer facing featuresPreferred Qualifications:At least five (5) years of software engineering experienceAbout the TeamThe Marketplace Fares Team powers global fares for all of Uber - that's all riders, drivers, eaters, new initiatives and technical consumers. Tens of billions of dollars in gross bookings flow through the systems and experiences within our responsibility. Our scope and critical work span the entire stack - from platform fare calculation for riders and drivers, to data science prediction of trustworthy upfront prices, to compelling mobile fare experiences for our customers.
